Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[M] /* short delay for sanity's sake */ \$delay(1.0, TRUE, "f884"); EmitTo(\$actor, "Caught the modify-dob verb"); EmitTo(\$actor, Describe (\$target)); /* confirm the item is held by the actor */ EmitTo(\$actor, Describe (\$env)); if(\$actor != \$env) \{ EmitTo(\$actor, "Yeah, nice try. Stop playing with other people's items."); return FALSE; \} else \{ EmitTo(\$actor, "Confirmed; you are holding this item -- " + Describe (\$target) + "."); \} return TRUE;
